name: Resurfacing of the Tigershark
description:
Six months ago, while travelling through the Arctic, a United States nuclear attack submarine, USS Tigershark, disappeared and was presumed lost. Despite a lengthy search and rescue operation by NATO coalition forces, the vessel was never discovered.

6 weeks after the vessel disappeared, all crew aboard the Tigershark were declared MIA. The disappearance was chalked up to a massive systems failure.

Four days ago, the Tigershark resurfaced, breaking through ice near an Arctic research station. You plan to to board the Tigershark, and try to determine the fate of the crew.

---

Ran out of time towards the end of this project! Lots of stuff planned, but only had enough time to put together this short experience. Hope you enjoy!
